EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Transportation-Email-Invite ACI APAC-T001ZM.Email 01
EmailTemplate.subject: Be our guest at ACI Asia-Pacific Regional Assembly
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> When every second counts…. building mission-critical communications for airports Be our guest at 13th ACI Asia-Pacific Regional Assembly Tokyo Bay Makuhari Hall, Narita, Japan 23 - 25 April 2018
Today’s airports handle millions of passengers each year while housing thousands of employees, from air traffic control to customs to concessions. To serve the continued growth in air traffic, airports must meet the highest standards of safety and security. At the same time airports must also ensure financial stability by reducing costs, increasing non-aeronautical revenue and ensuring their operational efficiency is being further improved through new advancements in technology.
Nokia experts will be at Booth #32 to discuss any topics that you are interested in and demonstrate our latest innovative products, solutions and services. Nokia is your trusted partner in ensuring the mission-critical communication system foundation for a smart, connected airport.
You can register to the event here <[[http://aci-asiapac.aero/upload/event/17/self/Narita2018.html?did=d000000000b5&utm_campaign=transportation_event&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email]]>
For more information on Nokia solutions for airports, visit our Webpage <[[https://networks.nokia.com/aviation?did=d000000000b5&utm_campaign=transportation_event&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email]]>
Looking forward to seeing you in Narita Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
